name: DRILLED [VR]
description:
-ESCAPE THE ROOM-

Dr Maboul is a student VR-horror project made in one month

You wake up in a rusty basement, pinned to an operation chair by rusty tools. 
Get out of here as soon as possible, but hush ! Don't let your captors know what you are trying to do.

-Team-

Philémon Caron -> Environment art and lighting

Alan Coeugnet & Dorian Helie -> Environment art & texturing

Isaac Charlet-> Character art and animation

Lisa Schotte -> Game Design

Tiphaine Riallot -> Sound design

Thomas Vignes-> Gameplay Programming & Design
